Keywords: Fantastic Four , Mystical , Past , Scientist
Real Name: Esteban Corazón De Ablo
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Ally
THE COUNCIL OF DOOM'S EXPERT ON THE MYSTIC ARTS: SIDELINE ACTIVE, UNIQUE MODIFIER - Friendly Captains and Sidekicks modify attack +1 when attacking 1+ characters with the Mystical keyword.
ALCHEMICAL MASTERY: Diablo may start the game with the FFFF #s001 Alchemical Potion equipped. When he rolls for its EFFECT, you may choose any number up to the result (Minimum 1).
DO YOU TRUST YOUR OWN EYES?: Incapacitate. Smoke Cloud. Smoke Cloud as FREE but only to generate up to 3 markers in adjacent squares.
